Name: YoshiEatGuidanceArea
Notes: If the player is riding Yoshi when inside this area, the game will display an explanation about how to eat items with Yoshi. If Obj_arg0 is set, it will explain how to shoot projectiles with Yoshi instead, provided that he is carrying a projectile in his mouth.

Obj_arg0.Name: Projectile Tutorial?
Obj_arg0.Description: If set, this will explain how to shoot projectiles with Yoshi instead.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: Gets activated after displaying the tutorial once.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.
